name: Trello Jobs Board
description: This spotless Trello layout gets rid of all the clunkiness, while preserving the very essential Trello workflow. The styles are based on "Trello clean" by Manu Morante and "Trello: label as top border (with text)" by Samuel Dellicour.
additional_info: Please consider that certain trello buttons are hidden. Also, cards can be only added in the first "Draft" list. CSS layout file is in "early beta" (very messy code). Version: 1.10 / Release Notes: - Layout tweaks Version: 1.09 / Release Notes: - Draft Items layout fix - card front layout tweaks - user badges Version: 1.08 / Release Notes: - card fronts overhaul - Amount of cards per list - reduced nav bar Version: 1.07 / Release Notes - various layout tweaks - autohide for header menu deactivated Known Issues: - list scollbar does not hide always in firefox (chrome is working)
